About Sur Le Fil (aka SLF)

SLF is an I.L.E. â€” Integrated Learning Environment (E.A.I. in French) â€” developed by AngeloStudio, blending science, history, and humor into a unique educational adventure.

In a whimsical 3D campus, you will explore and learn:

  • Electricity / Electronics

  • Mechanics

  • Computer Science (hardware & software)

  • Programming (C, C#, assembly, etc.)

  • Math, Physics, Chemistry, History of Science

Guided by Prof Fil and Kelhann (a mischievous little lightbulb), youâ€™ll attend classes, run real experiments (saltwater battery, telegraph, DIY multimeterâ€¦), and complete missions that grow in complexity.
